name: Base Ball Survivor
description:
The players summoned from baseball hell will attack you. Hit the ball back and make them ascend to heaven.

Controls:
[PC]
Move    WASD or Arrow
Swing    Mouse Left or Space key

[Mobile]
Move    Touch screen and drag
Swing    Touch screen

Developer: @hisashimaru_

This game was created during the Game Jam event, and was developed using C and Raylib.
